name: Smoky Black Beans, Parsley Chimichurri, Spinach Wraps.
description: Looking for a healthy vegan wrap recipe? Try my vegan smoky black bean wraps with spinach & chimichurri. These quick and easy vegetarian wraps are packed with plant-based protein, tasty, filling and make a great meatless lunch or dinner! They can easily be made gluten-free. Allergy Information: free of dairy, egg, corn, soy, yeast, and nuts.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 teaspoon chipotle chili pepper powder or to taste
1/2  Zucchini  (chopped small or other quick cooking squash)
a generous dash of liquid smoke (optional)
Daiya Cheddar or pepper jack shreds (optional )

itemListElement.text: In a pan, add oil and heat on medium. Add onion, garlic, bell pepper and cook for 6-8 minutes until onion is translucent. Add the spices, black beans, zucchini, tomato, salt, and liquid smoke. Mix well. Cover and cook on low-medium heat for 8-10 minutes. Taste and adjust salt and spice.
itemListElement.name: In a pan, add oil and heat on medium. Add onion, garlic, bell pepper and cook for 6-8 minutes until onion is translucent. Add the spices, black beans, zucchini, tomato, salt, and liquid smoke. Mix well. Cover and cook on low-medium heat for 8-10 minutes. Taste and adjust salt and spice.

itemListElement.text: Warm the tortilla. Spread a generous amount of parsley chimichurri on it (see notes for the recipe). Add the warm Smoky black beans, then some Daiya cheddar cheese. Top with thinly sliced red bell pepper, and baby spinach. Sprinkle with salt, pepper and some more chimichurri. Wrap and serve.
itemListElement.name: Warm the tortilla. Spread a generous amount of parsley chimichurri on it (see notes for the recipe). Add the warm Smoky black beans, then some Daiya cheddar cheese. Top with thinly sliced red bell pepper, and baby spinach. Sprinkle with salt, pepper and some more chimichurri. Wrap and serve.

keywords: healthy vegan wrap, vegan wrap recipe, wraps with black beans
